version.description: The version number for the Stage data file format.

cameraZoom.description: The default camera zoom level for the stage.

props.description: An array of props to add to the stage, specifying what sprites should be used and where those sprites should be positioned.

zIndex.description: Controls how high the prop is positioned over other props. Higher values will draw this prop over props with lower `zIndex`.

danceEvery.description: How often (in beats) should this prop bop to the music.

position.description: The horizontal and vertical position of the prop, in pixels.

scale.description: Specifies the size of the prop relative to it's original size.

name.description: The name of this prop. You only need this if you want to refer to this prop later in the code with `PlayState.instance.currentStage.getNamedProp(name)`.

alpha.description: Specifies the opacity of the prop, with `1.0` being fully opaque and `0.0` being completely transparent.

isPixel.description: Specifies whether to display this image as a pixel prop (disabling texture smoothing).

startingAnimation.description: The animation to play on the prop when the stage starts (remove if you don't want to play any animation).

scroll.description: Controls how much this prop moves with the camera [x,y] axis movements. '0' means it doesn't move at all, while '1' syncs it with camera movement in the given axis.

assetPath.description: Path to the sprite of this prop relative to 'images' folder OR hexadecimal color (since v1.0.1).

offsets.description: Offset from the prop's real position when playing this animation.

flipY.description: Whethever to flip Y axis of this prop when playing this animation.

frameRate.description: How many frames to play of this animation in 1 second.

prefix.description: Prefix of all frames making up this animations. Optional for 'Packer' props.

name.description: A name of this prop's animation.

looped.description: Whethever this animation should repeat itself after it finishes.

flipX.description: Whethever to flip X axis of this prop when playing this animation

frameIndices.description: A list of frame numbers to use for this animation. Empty list will use all available frames.

zIndex.description: A value describing the relative position of the player character. Elements with higher values get placed in front of those with lower values.

position.description: The X and Y position where the character should be positioned, relative to other props in the stage.

cameraOffsets.description: Offset to spply to camera's position when focusing on this character.

zIndex.description: Controls how high this character is positioned over other props. Higher values will draw this character over props with lower `zIndex`.
